snippet.title: Amplitude - Launch Trailer | PS4, PS3
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/amplitude-ps4/

Amplitude is a reboot of the 2003 PlayStation®2 music game by Harmonix Music Systems, Inc. The developers that worked on the original game are back to bring Amplitude to current Sony consoles with high-fidelity visuals, new music, a sci-fi narrative, and more. Play cooperatively, or competitively on over 30 songs, only on PlayStation! Available January 5th, 2016 on PlayStation®4. More information is available at http://www.harmonixmusic.com/games/amplitude/

©2015 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Amplitude is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Amplitude developed by Harmonix Music Systems, Inc
